name: darktowr
story: Dark Tower is a 2D arcade platform game - a clone of Snow Bros. The player controls a brown guy in blue shirt with baseball bat and kills enemies. Slain foes leave behind various bonuses. Action takes place on single screen - when player kills all enemies, it goes to next screen (like in Bubble Bobble or Nightmare in the Dark). The game has stolen graphic & music from other games, like Ghosts 'n' Goblins, Black Tiger or Double Dragon.
